translations.en: ** | ğŸƒ You continue on without paying any more attention to the phenomenon, but you keep watching the sky with admiration... Distracted, you don't immediately notice the huge crevasse in front of you! You end up crushed at the bottom of the hole, shaken and shocked, but you reassure yourself by realizing you aren't too critically injured!
